Description: Southern Utah s Dixie State University should change its name to Utah Tech University, the board of trustees voted Tuesday after the school's previous name
Title: Dixie State trustees vote on another new name after backlash
Author: SOPHIA EPPOLITO

Description: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill's trustees' earlier refusal to take up her case inspired a bruising national debate over race, journalism and academic freedom
Title: After Contentious Debate, UNC Grants Tenure To Nikole Hannah Jones
Author: David Folkenflik

Description: Vibrations from cars and pedestrians create unique signals in cables Now scientists have used the trick to show how Covid 19 brought life to a halt
Title: How Underground Fiber Optics Spy on Humans Moving Above
Author: Matt Simon

Description: The latest toll from Johns Hopkins University comes nearly four months after the nation crossed the half million mark for deaths from the coronavirus pandemic
Title: The U S Has Hit 600,000 COVID Deaths, More Than Any Other Country
Author: Scott Neuman

Description: Some decisions require a lot of thought weighing pros and cons, and trying to reach the best possible outcome But some people are indecisive about pretty much everything, big or small Whether you re dealing with an ambivalent person, or you are an ambivalen
Title: How Being Ambivalent Can Help You Make Better Decisions
Author: Elizabeth Yuko
